dockur/portainer-backup

Backup utility for Portainer

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Docker container for backing up multiple database types
  • CLI for backing up Docker containers, including physical volume data
  • backup docker volumes to s3, local, or cloud storage
  • modular Docker backup with smart scheduling and label-based config
  • Dumps and restores databases to cloud storage
  • manage Docker and Kubernetes containers with a simple web dashboard
  • automated postgres backups to local filesystem with rotation
  • System backup with S3 storage and Docker support
  • Desktop backup client for BorgBackup on macOS and Linux
